title: Three spheres

children.value:
Three spheres are in a triangular arrangement on a plane, spot welded together where they touch. Another sphere is placed on top of the first three. Take the spheres to be identical, of mass 
$\vari{m}$
 and radius 
$\vari{a}$
. Assume where necessary that the contacts are smooth. What is the tension in the weld necessary to keep the pyramid stable when the mass is 0.8 kg?
